name: Replay (FoorFootStudios)
description:
Download the game for the best experience! If you decide to play on a web browser, use hardware acceleration for a smoother experience.

This is a submission for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 game jam. The theme was "Rewind"

I recommend you playing until you see the ending! I made walkthrough videos (normal and hard) so even if you get stuck somewhere, you will be able to see the ending without a problem!

Description:
All of sudden you wake up somewhere you've never been before. You attempt to get out. You have a special ability. To RECORD AND REWIND time. Use your ability to get to the end! Make sure you also see the ending of the game!

Controls:
A, D - Move Left, Right

R - Start/Stop Recording

E - Shoot

If you get stuck somewhere:
You can always use "To checkpoint" option in the options menu (which you can open with ESC key) to go back to your last checkpoint.

If you get killed by an enemy or fall into a lava, you cannot go back to your checkpoint. The game is over.

Walkthrough:
If you're stuck somewhere, I've made two walkthrough videos (normal and hard paths):

The doors (that can be opened) are colored with Grey
